attributes.additional_details:
If we are to have an international border separate our lands, then we are on the better side. We wish to no longer associate with a country that disrespects the people of Kent in this way.

If you want us to be foreigners so badly, then we will grant you that wish.

I hope you are happy with yourselves.
attributes.background: To grant independence to the County of Kent and the Unitary Authority of Medway.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the people of Kent.  You could have a petition calling for the Government to hold a referendum, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
